tool_description: Personalizes review request messages using customer data, purchase history, and behavioral patterns to increase engagement rates.

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs to personalize messages for

template_content.description: Base template content with placeholder variables

personalization_level.description: Level of personalization: basic, standard, advanced

include_product_details.description: Whether to include specific product information

include_purchase_date.description: Whether to reference the purchase date

include_customer_name.description: Whether to use customer's name in personalization

dynamic_content.description: Additional dynamic content elements to include

error_messages: Empty customer list: customer_ids array cannot be empty.
Invalid template: template_content cannot be empty and must contain valid placeholders.
Invalid personalization level: Must be one of [basic, standard, advanced].
Customer data incomplete: Some customers lack sufficient data for requested personalization level.
Language not supported: Requested language is not available in the system.
Template parsing error: Unable to parse template placeholders correctly.
usage: Provide customer IDs and a template to generate personalized messages. Configure personalization level and options to match your campaign goals.

personalized_messages.description: Fully personalized messages for each customer

personalization_success.description: Whether personalization was successful for each customer

used_variables.description: List of personalization variables successfully applied

message_lengths.description: Character count for each personalized message
